meanings.definition: A group of businesses or nations that agree to act together to control prices and limit competition.
meanings.sent1: The cartel of oil companies decided to raise prices together.
meanings.sent2: The drug cartel smuggled illegal substances across borders.
meanings.sent3: The cookie cartel in the office made sure no one else got any treats.
meanings.sent4: The cartel of fashion designers dominated the industry with their latest trends.
meanings.sent5: The cartel of farmers banded together to negotiate better prices for their crops.

meanings.definition: A combination of political groups for a common purpose.
meanings.sent1: The cartel of political parties worked together to pass new laws.
meanings.sent2: The environmental cartel advocated for stricter regulations to protect the planet.
meanings.sent3: The superhero cartel assembled to fight crime in the city.
meanings.sent4: The student council cartel organized events for the school community.
meanings.sent5: The cartel of animal rights activists protested against animal cruelty.
